content:
There's a port request for the Adaptive theme, one of the most installed Drupal themes. Is anyone interested? https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/427

Port request for AdaptiveTheme 路 Issue #427 路 backdrop-ops/contrib
Name of the module, theme, or layout AdaptiveTheme Link to the drupal.org module, theme, or layout https://www.drupal.org/project/adaptivetheme (Optional) Link to an issue in the drupal.org queue a...
